content: If a car travels at an average speed of 60 mph for 4 hours, how far has it traveled?

If a car travels at an average speed of 60 miles per hour (mph) for 4 hours, the distance it has traveled can be calculated using the formula:

Distance = Speed × Time

Plugging in the given values:

Distance = 60 mph × 4 hours = 240 miles

So, the car has traveled 240 miles.
